name: mern-practice
description: MERN Stack Practice Project with RBAC and E-commerce features

scripts.check:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.check:backend: cd backend && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.check:all: npm run check:frontend && npm run check:backend
scripts.fix:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.fix:backend: cd backend && npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.fix:all: npm run fix:frontend && npm run fix:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
